data.name: Foreign Currency Term Deposit
data.description: A Foreign Currency Term Deposit (FCTD) is a type of term deposit offered under a facility that allows you to invest foreign currency with us for a fixed term.

features.additionalInfo: Protection against unfavourable foreign exchange rate movements over time.

Foreign Currency Term Deposits are available in a number of currencies which include United States Dollars, Great Britain Pounds, Canadian Dollars, Danish Kroner,Euro,Hong Kong Dollars ,Japanese Yen ,New Zealand Dollars, Norwegian Kroner, Singapore Dollars ,Swiss Francs.
The interest rate is fixed during the Term of the Foreign Currency Term Deposit.

The Term of your Foreign Currency Term Deposit (ranges between 7 days to six months),  if you want to withdraw money before the maturity date of the deposit the interest rate on the deposit will likely be reduced to reflect the reduced term.
There is interest rate risk and currency risk involved with this product, please refer to the product PDS for more information .
The Term of Foreign Currency Term Deposit is from 7 days to six months.

constraints.additionalInfo: The minimum deposit size is $50,000 AUD equivalent.

fees.name: Amount withdrawal or deposit
fees.additionalInfo: There are no transaction  fees payable on a Foreign Currency Term Deposit.

fees.name: Monthly service fees
fees.additionalInfo: There is no  monthly service fees payable on a Foreign Currency Term Deposit.

fees.name: Duplicate Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $6.00 per page for each duplicate account statement or notice plus if you ask for a duplicate statement or notice more than three months after the original statement or notice was issued, we may charge a fee of $60.00 per hour or part thereof if it is necessary to search for or recreate statements or notices. These fees are payable at the time the event occurs or when the service is provided.
